name: Intro
_source: speak;Selena;So this is a dragonstone...|The description was accurate.|It looks like an ordinary gemstone.|If only His Majesty hadn't ordered me to bring this to the capital immediately...|I've heard reports that Prince Ephraim and a Frelian army have landed nearby.|If I didn't have those blasted restrictive orders, I could-
speak;Myrrh;Return the stone to me...|Please...I'll do anything.
speak;Selena;Why do you want the stone?|Who are you?|You're not from Grado, that's for sure.
speak;Myrrh;Without the stone, I...|Please, give it back to me.

speak;Myrrh;My name is Myrrh.|I come from Darkling Woods.|I was betrayed, and my stone was taken from me.|I was imprisoned, caged, to be transported somewhere.|Prince Ephraim came to my rescue.|I've been traveling in his care ever since.
speak;Selena;You're with Ephraim?|I can't let you leave.|Maybe I should take you back to the capital with me.
speak;Myrrh;Wait...|You're from Grado?|Tell me, has anyone around you-|Have you noticed any changes in the people around you recently?
speak;Selena;Changes?|What do you mean by that?
speak;Myrrh;Anyone near you...|Has anyone been transformed, either in spirit or demeanor?|Does anyone act in such a way as to appear a different person altogether?
speak;Myrrh;The darkness is to blame.|I've come here to stop it.
speak;Selena;You will tell me more.|If I find you are lying, I will punish you.|Do you understand?
speak;Myrrh;Yes.|Are you ready?|I will tell you everything I know.
speak;Selena;...I see.|Myrrh, I think I understand everything you've told me.
speak;Selena;But I cannot believe it.|How can I allow myself to believe it?|If it's true, then...|then His Majesty is already-

speak;Selena;It is a fluorspar...|His Majesty presented it to me when I was promoted to general.|This gemstone is proof of my commission.|It's one of Grado's treasures...|I received it years ago, but I remember that day like it was yesterday.|His Majesty smiled so kindly.|His voice was filled with dignity and affection...
speak;Myrrh;Dame Selena, you love your emperor, don't you?
speak;Myrrh;I can see it.|Dame Selena, I can see how much you treasure...

speak;Selena;His Majesty is most compassionate.|You see, I'm a commoner.|I was raised in a desolate, impoverished village.|My family couldn't afford our taxes.|No one could.|We were desperate. Some of us considered...horrible things to make enough money to survive winter.|Then, supplies began to arrive.|We were told they came from the emperor himself.|He sent them to us, a poor frontier town who couldn't even afford to pay taxes.
speak;Selena;Neighboring kingdoms must have thought the emperor mad, I can only guess.|But His Majesty did not care about his standing among kings.|He cared for his people.|He saved us.

speak;Selena;That spring, I went to the capital and became a soldier, then a knight.|I wanted to dedicate my life to the emperor who had saved it.|I felt I understood his dream, I felt I shared his vision...
speak;Selena;Myrrh, this wave of dark energy you spoke of...|Can its evil really change a person that completely?
speak;Myrrh;Yes...|All trace of this person would be consumed...destroyed.
speak;Selena;How can this process be reversed?
speak;SoldierRed;Dame Selena.|Enemy troops are heading this way!|We await your orders.
speak;Selena;Understood.|Tell the men we meet them head on.
speak;Selena;Myrrh. I release you.|Return to Prince Ephraim's side.
speak;Selena;I apologize, but I cannot return your dragonstone to you.|I vowed never again to fail in my duty to His Majesty.|If you want the dragonstone back, tell Ephraim he must defeat me.
speak;Selena;Go now!|This place will soon run red!
speak;Selena;All troops to arms!|For the glory of Grado!
speak;Seth;Prince Ephraim, the Grado troops are lining up to the fore.|Their commander is a Grado general...|It's Selena Fluorspar.
speak;Larachel;Selena...|I've heard she wields the power of the thunderstorm...|that she uses its might to attack from afar without mercy.
speak;Seth;Prince Ephraim, I urge you to exercise caution when faced with such magic.

speak;Gerik;Prince Innes said they would be around here somewhere.|Now where in blazes is this Ephraim?
speak;Tethys;From this distance, I can't tell which army is Frelia and which Grado.|We'll have to move in closer if we're to sort this all out.
speak;Tethys;Oh, what an adorable girl.|It's all right.|Come here...
speak;Gerik;You're a bit young to be on your own.|Did you get lost then?
speak;Tethys;There's no reason to be afraid.|This fellow's a bit scary to look at, but he's not so bad.
speak;Gerik;Come now...|Hmph. But she is right, you know.|If you keep looking so scared, you're likely to hurt my feelings.
speak;Tethys;Please, little one, tell us your name.
speak;Myrrh;I am Myrrh.|I wish to return to Ephraim's side.
speak;Gerik;Ephraim?|We're supposed to be guarding someone by that name....|Can you help us find him?
speak;Myrrh;It's because I forced you to bring me with you...|I didn't want to be a burden to you any longer.|But all I've done is made you worry...|I'm...sorry...
speak;Ephraim;It's fine, Myrrh.|I'm the one who should be sorry.|I failed in my promise to watch over you.|The battle's about to begin.|I want you to move to the rear.
speak;Myrrh;Ephraim...|Those aren't bad people.|I spoke to one, and she listened-
speak;Ephraim;All right.|I'll do my best to persuade them to join us.
speak;Gerik;This may be our last battle...|I still got my <red>Sword</> and can use an <red>Axe</>.|I've got plenty of fight in me!|Maybe can even find a <red>Lance</> to use!|Ha ha ha!
